CustomField.formula: IF (AND(OR( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Rebid") , ISPICKVAL( Type , "Extension")), ( Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c - Current_Contract_Value__c > 0)), ( Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c - Current_Contract_Value__c), IF (AND(OR( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Rebid") , ISPICKVAL( Type , "Extension")), ( Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c - Current_Contract_Value__c <= 0)), 0, Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c ))
CustomField.label: Contractual Growth
